collation.cr: [normalization on] [reorder Deva Beng Guru Gujr Orya Taml Telu Knda Mlym Sinh] # # The following tailoring is an adjustment of the # DUCET collation order for ANUSVARA, CANDRABINDU, # and VISARGA. Instead of being sorted with secondary # weights, they are collated on primary level before # the independent vowels. CANDRABINDU is secondary # different from ANUSVARA. This gives a sort order # similar to Hindi. # &ॐ<ं<<ँ<ः # # The following tailoring is an adjustment of the # DUCET collation order for LLA. Instead of being # sorted after LA, LLA is sorted after HA. # &ह<ळ # # KSSA is sorted after LLA. # <क्ष # # JNYA is sorted after KSSA. # <ज्ञ
